body_html: @keryell There are really interesting topics for Matrix/Tensor in the new SG14 c++ specially in vector/SIMD calls agenda. But seems that nobody talked of convolution, pooling, and others useful "stabilized" deep learning interfaces. Also seems to me that in this specific standardization subgroups there are people from Nvidia, Intel, Amd, CodePlay etc.. but not from Google also if it is in others groups.

body: @keryell There are really interesting topics for Matrix/Tensor  in the new SG14 c++ specially in vector/SIMD calls agenda. But seems that nobody talked  of convolution, pooling, and others useful "stabilized" deep learning interfaces. Also seems to me that in this specific standardization subgroups there are people from Nvidia, Intel, Amd, CodePlay etc.. but not from Google also if it is in others groups.
